Learn Vim the Smart Way Newsletter

Rome wasn't build in a day and VIM can't be masted in a day. A common mistake people make when learning VIM is trying to master it all at once. VIM was meant to be learned incrementally.

By absorbing VIM one shortcut at a time you can Learn VIM the Smart Way. This newsletter is designed for beginners and advanced users alike. You'll receive 1 email every Monday morning with a unique set of VIM tips. Learn the new skill throughout the week and repeat this week by week. Before you know it you'll be a VIM ninja.

Each email contains 3 sections a VIM tip, a .vimrc mapping, and a VIM plugin. The VIM tip of the week that covers a specific feature that can be anything from find and replace to how to time travel in VIM.

Remember: VIM saves lives 1 keystroke at a time
